summary:
Professional certified coach at LaMatu, currently working and living in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. 

LaMatu offers a variety of coaching services, including online consultations, face-to-face conversations and an active coaching session format during a walk in the park. I specialise in the intersection of private and work-sphere, which makes it possible to tackle dilemmas from both personal and professional domain. 

Thanks to my holistic approach the conversation topics may go well beyond traditional career coaching and mentoring, to include broader dilemmas such as identifying a life purpose, stress management, life-balance, cultivating a positive mindset, eradicating limiting beliefs and making healthy lifestyle choices. 

The conversations can be conducted in English, Dutch or Polish. 

Throughout my 16 years working in international corporate environments those I have gained experience in managing complex projects and leading muti-functional, international teams. I have developed passion for both the digital world and human interactions. My professional business background is in digital marketing of consumer goods products in B2B and B2C sectors, in industries such as electronics, home furnishing, retail and beauty for leading international consumer brands across Europe, including Dyson, Philips, IKEA, Nikon and L’Oréal. 


Coaching qualifications:
- Licensed Practitioner of Neuro-Linguistic Programming® by The Society of Neuro-Linguistic Programming™ - October 2016
- Coaching Skills for Managers Specialization by University College, Davis, December 2020 
- Certified Professional Coach by Associate voor Coaching - September 2021 - January 2022

Membership at Professional Associations:
- Member of the International Coaching Federation - since January 2022
- Member of Collectief Alternatieve Therapeuten (CAT) - since January 2022
- Member of Stichting Geschilleninstantie Alternatieve Therapeuten (GAT) - since January 2022

Project management background:
Certified by PMI as an Agile Practitioner (ACP)® as well as a Project Management Professional (PMP)® and APMG PRINCE2® Practitioner, experienced at working according to various project management methodologies

Yoga qualifications:
- Certified Yoga Teacher RYT® 200 - September 2021 
* Registered Yoga Teacher RYT® 500 - expected November 2022

profile_positions.description: Firsthand (perviously Infobase, Vault, Evisors) is an online mentoring platform supporting MBA and university graduates with support in (re)entering the job market, job transitions and other career-related questions. In my role I have been conducting coaching conversations and mock interviews, as well as providing resume/CV & portfolio critique and personal branding advice.

volunteer_experiences.description: Female Ventures believe that every woman leads her own venture. By uniting ambitious women and sharing inspiring stories and network connections, Female Ventures wants to empower women to grow and lead their career. Female Ventures regularly organises events in major cities in the Netherlands including Amsterdam, Delft, Eindhoven, the Hague, Rotterdam and Utrecht. During these events the speakers share their stories and the attendees can feel the energy of meeting and supporting their peers.

The International Mentoring Programme aims to support female members of PWN, at all levels of their career, to find their ways to progress, develop their leadership and decision-making skills, and embrace their growth in an international environment. The programme offers participants various occasions to leverage their mentoring experience. PWN provides an effective mentoring structure to ensure that the participants get the most out of their mentoring experience, by calling upon a wide range of mentors, ensuring the best possible matches, and following up on each individual's progress throughout the entire mentoring cycle.

The aim of the programme is to facilitate the exchange of knowledge and experience outside of your regular working environment. It is designed for women and men who are willing to invest in their personal and professional development, actively navigate their life and want to have a positive impact on society. The Polaris Foundation Mentoring Program is a highly regarded, one-year long program that can help the mentees get a fresh perspective on your career status & future aspirations, clarify their next steps in your personal growth, set up and reach their personal and professional goals, step outside comfort zone; inspire and contribute to the growth of others while developing yourself, learn from amazing mentors, from perspectives of great professionals outside the member's own organisation, build lasting professional relationships and broaden one's network.
Participating in a variety of training sessions on diversity and inclusion. Acting as a mentor as a part of a programme promoting diversity in the workforce in the Netherlands.

PD Talks connects like-minded people interested in Personal Development to inspire and encourage each other on our collective and individual journeys to become our best selves and maximise our happiness. Expect to learn about yourself and what's possible in life and have fun with ambitious people. Looking forward to help each other achieve our life's dreams and goals.
During this period I was assisting during hatha, vinyasa and restorative yoga classes, as well as ayurvedic workshops at Delight Yoga studios in Amsterdam.

The AlphaBet Club is an international not-for-profit organisation helping children in need to break the cycle of poverty through education. ABC is funded by donations, sponsorships and proceeds from ABC [FUN]draising events in Amsterdam and Madrid.
